definition: a combat between two mounted knights tilting against each other with blunted lances, to joust against somebody in a tournament by fighting on horseback
details:
noun
- a combat between two mounted knights tilting against each other with blunted lances
= example: a combat between two mounted knights tilting against each other with blunted lances
= synonyms: tilt
verb
- to joust against somebody in a tournament by fighting on horseback
= example: to joust against somebody in a tournament by fighting on horseback
